contentrichtext.text: :''For the Hilda Doolittle poem, see [[Oread (poem)]]. For the lake in Greece, see [[Lake Orestiada]]. For the city in Greece, see [[Orestiada]]''. {{refimprove|date=April 2008}} {{Greek myth (nymph)}} In [[Greek mythology]], an '''Oread''' or '''Orestiad''' (Ὀρεάδες / Όρεστιάδες from ὄρος, "mountain") was a type of [[nymph]] that lived in mountains, valleys, and ravines. They differ from each other according to their dwelling: the Idaeae were from [[Mount Ida]], Peliades from Mount Pelion, etc. They were associated with [[Artemis]], since the goddess, when she went out hunting, preferred mounts and rocky precipices. ==Oreads== The number of Oreads includes but is not limited to: * [[Britomartis]] * [[Claea]] (Mount Calathion, [[Messenia]])<ref>[[Pausanias (geographer)|Pausanias]], ''Description of Greece'' 3.26.11</ref> * [[Mount Kyllini|Cyllene]] or Kyllene (Mount [[Mount Kyllini|Cyllene]])<ref>''[[Bibliotheca (Pseudo-Apollodorus)|Bibliotheca]]'' 3.8.1</ref> * [[Daphnis]] (Mount [[Parnassos]])<ref>[[Pausanias (geographer)|Pausanias]], ''Description of Greece'' 10.5.5</ref> * [[Echo (mythology)|Echo]] (Mount [[Cithaeron]])<ref>[[Aristophanes]], ''Thesmophoriazusae'' 970</ref> * The Idaeae ([[Mount Ida]], [[Crete]]):<ref>''[[Bibliotheca (Pseudo-Apollodorus)|Bibliotheca]]'' 1.4.5</ref><ref>[[Hyginus]], ''Astronomica'', 2.2</ref> ** [[Adrasteia]] ** [[Cynosura]] ** [[Helike (mythology)|Helike]] ** Ida * [[Nomia]] (Mount Nomia, [[Arcadia]])<ref>[[Pausanias (geographer)|Pausanias]], ''Description of Greece'' 8.38.0</ref> * [[Othreis (mythology)|Othreis]] (Mount [[Othrys]], [[Malis]])<ref>[[Antoninus Liberalis]], ''Metamorphoses'' 13</ref> * Sinoe (Mount Sinoe, [[Arcadia]])<ref>[[Pausanias (geographer)|Pausanias]], ''Description of Greece'' 8.30.2</ref> * The Sphragitides <ref>[[Plutarch]], ''Life of Aristides'' 11. 3</ref> or Cithaeronides (Mount [[Cithaeron]])<ref>[[Pausanias (geographer)|Pausanias]], ''Description of Greece'' 9.3.9</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Oreads| ]] [[Category:Greek legendary creatures]] [[Category:Greek mythology]] [[Category:Nymphs]]
